page.title: 06NEW INDUSTRY, RUGELEY
page.content: Unemployment in Rugeley is higher than in surrounding districts. Several areas round Rugeley have been set aside for industrial development. These industrial estates provide people with jobs and small businesses with the opportunity of starting up. The Riverside Industrial Estate lies off Power Station Road, Rugeley and consists of 38 units each having a workshop or storage space and offices. At the time of the survey, 5 units were unoccupied. The rest included:- plant hire (3), radiators, plastics, precision tools, security gates & fences, distributors, designers, graphic art supplies, sports goods, industrial packers, aluminium window frame manufacturers, noise control, building insulation, moisture control, record distributors, soft drinks and wholesale meat (3).
